comment.content: If it helps, this test is failing on "test-jsf-modular-source". You can test it locally using "ant test-jsf-modular-source" from the plugins/appfuse-maven-plugin directory.

I will try to fix it in the evening. If you need to make APM green earlier please revert my changes (I don't have my GitHub key with me right now).
I have to take a look at an Ant task, how to pass -e to Maven. The following error message isn't very verbose: > Execution default-cli of goal org.appfuse.plugins:appfuse-maven-plugin:2.2.2-SNAPSHOT:full-source failed. NullPointerException -> [Help 1]
Any idea why it seems to be not built?
This error seems to be here for a while, but I don't know why my changes in #235 could cause it.
All archetypes build fine locally. The same plugins (from Maven and Ant). I remember I have seen this error before on Bamboo, but not sure what was a reason. Any idea?
